name: Fazbear Nightmare
description:
Returning to her childhood home of Trillium County
Charlie Faz meets with her long time friends to remember the lives of people they lost.
What starts off as a night of reliving childhood memories turns into a dark twisted fight for survival.

Who Is the man calling himself Uncle Vince?
What happened during the “Red Tag” Incident in ‘97?
Was Frederick innocent?
Can Charlie save everyone?

Experience Five Night’s at Freddy’s like never before
Explore the abandoned Trillium mall a collaboration project between Faz Robotics and Afton Telecom.
Find Clues to a case that went cold long ago

Forget Five Nights.
Charlie only has Five Hours

  • New Mechanics
  • New Locations
  • New Story

“This game is unofficial to the FNAF timeline and uses its own version of canon”
